overview:
Antonio is the founder and CEO of Beintoo.

Before Beintoo he was Head of R&D and Products for the digital advertising division of Dada. He was in charge of all products design and strategy for performance advertising, leading an international team of 30 professionals in UK and Italy. He followed relationships with all strategic partners of Dada for online advertising. Before Dada he was Cofounder and CEO of Adright, a startup focused on innovative technology for performance advertising, acquired by Dada spa in January 2009. He also cofounded and served as CTO of PreCYdent Inc, a San Diego based startup that created and patented an innovative algorithm for legal research based on complex theory. He has several international publications on network theory and performance advertising algorithms. He has a master degree in Mathematical Engineering at the Polytechnic of Milan and a double degree in Engineering Sciences at the Ecole Centrale de Paris. He loves Internet but his greatest passion is traveling around the world , scuba diving and studying foreign languages.

relationships.title: Head of Products for online advertising
